definition: Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the determination of alcohol residue in enoxacin gluconate by GC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立葡萄糖酸依诺沙星中乙醇残留量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Pectins are composed of a galactose derivative, chitin of a glucose derivative.
sentences.chinese: 果胶是由半乳糖变异体和葡萄糖变异体角素构成。

sentences.english: After the animal is killed, glycogen falls apart into glucose.
sentences.chinese: 动物被杀后，肝糖元分解为葡萄糖。

sentences.english: A study was made of the effect of cathode material and various operating conditions on the elec- troboc reduchon of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 研究了阴极材料及工艺条件对葡萄糖电解还原的影响。

sentences.english: Glucose Oxidase is the key enzyme instrument of blood-glucose determination.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖氧化酶是测定血糖的关键工具酶。

sentences.english: These engineered nanoparticles react with glucose molecules found in tears.
sentences.chinese: 这些经设计的纳米微粒与泪液中的葡萄糖分子反应。

sentences.english: The results demonstrate glucose is better than sodium lactate in view of higher Coulombic cumulation and COD reduction.
sentences.chinese: 与乳酸钠相比，葡萄糖是本体系中较理想的底物。

sentences.english: The nitrogen grave sour thorn incites thrusts out the island element secretion and the glucose stimulation has the synergism.
sentences.chinese: 氮墓酸刺滋腆岛素分泌与葡萄糖的刺激有协同作用。

sentences.english: Text: A glucose molecule is a six-carbon sugar, consisting of a total of 24 atoms.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖是一个总共由24个原子组成的六碳糖分子。

sentences.english: The intracellular use of glucose and glycogen is tightly regulated at four points.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖和肝糖原的胞内作用在四个地方被严格控制。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of blood glucose test in neonatal hyperbilirubinemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究新生儿高胆红素血对血葡萄糖测定的影响。

sentences.english: NB: If glucose can't get into the cells, it builds up in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 如果葡萄糖不能进入细胞，就会积聚在血液中。

sentences.english: Polydextrose can act as a humectant in these kind of recipes.
sentences.chinese: 聚葡萄糖可以在这些配方中担当一种保湿剂。

sentences.english: Polysaccharide capsules or inclusions are polymers of glucose and other sugars .
sentences.chinese: 多聚糖胶囊或包括是葡萄糖和其它糖聚合物。

sentences.english: Most qualities of polydextrose contain small amounts of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 大多聚葡萄糖的品质都含有少量葡萄糖。

sentences.english: Most qualities of polydextrose contain small amounts of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 大多聚葡萄糖的品质都含有少量葡萄糖。

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
